snippet: American generals and civilian officials acknowledge that they have all but written off battering the Taliban into a peace deal.
abstract: American generals and civilian officials acknowledge that they have all but written off battering the Taliban into a peace deal.
lead_paragraph: American generals and civilian officials acknowledge that they have all but written off what was once one of the cornerstones of their strategy to end the war here: battering the Taliban into a peace deal, Matt Rosenberg (@mrosenbergNYT) and Rod Nordland (@rodnordland) report in today’s Times. They write:

headline.main: U.S. Abandoning Hopes for Taliban Peace Deal

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
